0.1.0.name: connect20/Adwise_DynamicRemarketing
0.1.0.description: The Adwise DynamicRemarketing module allows shop owners to easily embed the Google Dynamic Remarketing javascript code on their webshop pages by simply enabeling the module in Magento`s system configuration options.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
